title: Womens Jumpsuit Wide Leg Sleeveless Off Shoulder

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the jumpsuit fits well, with one mentioning it's long enough for tall girls, and appreciate its flattering design that compliments body shape while hiding the stomach area. The material is thick and comfortable, with one customer noting it breathes well, while another mentions it's true to size. They like its appearance, with one customer noting it looks good even after multiple washes, and one describing it as "drop dead gorgeous." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!!
items.body: I am beyond picky with clothes and I am never satisfied/think anything looks good on me. That being said, I love this!! It was comfortable, quality material, hides the belly, and there are multiple different ways to style the top! I also paired a gold chain belt to help break up the top and bottom. I am 5’3, 160lbs, 32J bra size Medium fit perfectly! I was worried about the pants sense I’m short, but they were fine with small small heels! Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and elegant!
items.body: This jumpsuit is incredibly comfortable. The fabric is excellent quality, soft, and fits your body beautifully. It hugs your shape in a flattering way and looks very elegant. Perfect for dressing up or down depending on the occasion. I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Diana Garcia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Causal night out
items.body: Package was on time and fit perfectly! I got a XL but i could have got a L. It was thick as well which i like. Very cute for a casual night out Read more
items.author: AJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Yes for this jumper.
items.body: Get this. This was a great buy. If there was a belt of any kind and pockets, I would have given it 5 stars. The color was good. It is comfortable to wear and easy to slip on/off without touching the zipper. It can be dressed up or down. The back is low enough to be cute but not too low to show your undergarments. I did not wear a strapless bra because a regular bra worked fine without using the right-side strap. The material is has a little stretch so it is flattering but not too much stretch to cheapen the look. The material is thick enough not to be see through but not thick enough to be stiff. The fit is true to size. I'm 5'6, 155-160lbs, 30% body fat, 25.5 bmi and a medium fit perfectly like the model. I can see getting more colors if it washes well and i anticipate that it will wash well based on its good quality. I'll update the review if it does not wash well in the gentle cycle. Update: Washed it 2 times & it still looks like new. Read more
items.author: Jay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous!
items.body: I'm 5'10. This jumpsuit fit perfectly. The fabric is very soft and right for the occasion. Easy to get on and off. I didn't need to unzip when using the restroom. I'm ordering more colors. Read more
items.author: Aleethea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, comfortable, vibrant color blue
items.body: This outfit was well made and beautiful blue color! Was comfortable to wear all night at wedding, and received so many compliments! Did not get a picture, but I dressed it up with rhinestone necklace, tennis bracelet and earrings, elegant! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but maybe size up
items.body: Super cute jumpsuit but fits snug on the hips and booty. Read more
items.author: Jessie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars overall cute
items.body: Rcvd today. Ordered szM, I’m 5’6 128lbs. It’s pretty baggy and could’ve gone with a szS but need for event tomorrow so will wash and dry in hopes to shrink it. Also, the sleeves do not sit as cute as the pic on the model but will make it work. Returning this and going to reorder due to sewing off seam at bottom of zipper and makes it look like a lump in the butt. Material is a little cheap. Overall is great for the $ and recommend sizing down. Read more
items.author: Samanth

short_description:
Womens Jumpsuit Wide Leg Sleeveless Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Jumpsuit Wide Leg Sleeveless Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, Purple, Royalblue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
